text: Baralle is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 15 miles (24 km) southeast of Arras at the junction of the D14, D16 and D19 roads. The entire commune was obliterated during World War I. ==Population== ==Sights== * The ruins of an early castle. * The church of St. Georges, dating from the twentieth century. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Baralle
